sentences.english: He said it, why give me the feeling that speeches.
sentences.chinese: 他說的話，爲什麼總給我感覺是話中有話。

sentences.english: Suck out some marrow. That one was.
sentences.chinese: 要我說“吸取一些精髓”，那纔是話中有話。

sentences.english: She said very little, but a great deal by implication.
sentences.chinese: 她說得很少，然而有很多話中有話。

sentences.english: There is something to what he's just said.
